    Adrax set down on the doorstep of the lair of Ominous. Former lair 
actually. It looked like a wall of ice and no opening what-so-ever. He turned 
on his Inferred vision and saw the crack of the door. He dug his fingers in, 
opened the doors, and when the two were inside safely, he closed them. 
    Inside, the computers were up and running, the right wall was covered in 
firearms, and in the back was a CR chamber. 
    Home sweet home.
